metadata.title: CVE-2019-12481 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GPAC 0.7.1. There is a NULL pointer dereference in the function GetESD at isomedia/track.c in libgpac.a, as demonstrated by MP4Box.

criterions.comment: gpac package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
